name: Civic responsibility
description: In 2017 after my first Burning Man its philosophy left a deep mark on me. I collaborated with ukrainian BM community member Oleksii Novikov to create an article about 10 BM principles. He was a writer and I illustrated it with GIF animations mostly based on my real paintings. I see a lot of parallels with the NFT and the Burner’s community and that inspires me a lot. Now I feel like its in our power to change default world. Here’s the seventh of 10 Burning Man principles “Civic responsibility".
